name: The Survivalists RPG (itch)
description:
The day their last album dropped, so did a comet! Join The Survivalists, the last band on Earth, as they explore what's left of their world. Enjoy hours of gameplay set to 8-bit versions of The Survivalists music from their new album Everything Is Awful (Available now on No Time Records).
Take down an evil organization, threatening the last remnants of humanity! Travel through a vast post-apocalyptic world! Complete meaningless side-quests! Fight a plethora of post game bosses!
